name: The Gods of Rega Collection
description:
A full pantheon of twenty gods, with creation myth and two additional mythic stories. Also contains a regional map, a little information about the Successor States of Rega, a new playable race and a new monster for 5e, though the majority of the material is system agnostic.

Includes: Myth of Creation, Nine Trials of Magnus, Tale of the Winds

Moral. Upstanding. Progressive. Inclusive. A modern pantheon for medieval fantasy.
